# hv_vcpu_get_simd_fp_reg(_:_:_:)

**Function**

Gets the current value of a vCPU SIMD and FP register.

## Declaration

```swift
func hv_vcpu_get_simd_fp_reg(_ vcpu: hv_vcpu_t, _ reg: hv_simd_fp_reg_t, _ value: UnsafeMutablePointer<hv_simd_fp_uchar16_t>) -> hv_return_t
```

## Parameters

- **vcpu**: The vCPU instance.
- **reg**: The ID of the SIMD and FP register.
- **value**: The value of the register `reg` on output.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.hypervisor/documentation/Hypervisor/HV_SUCCESS] if the operation was successful, otherwise an error code specified in [doc://com.apple.hypervisor/documentation/Hypervisor/hv_return_t].

## Discussion



## SIMD & Floating-point registers

- **hv_vcpu_set_simd_fp_reg(_:_:_:)**: Sets the value of a vCPU SIMD&FP register.
- **hv_simd_fp_uchar16_t**: The value that represents an ARM SIMD and FP register.
- **hv_simd_fp_reg_t**: The type that defines SIMD and floating-point registers.
